page.title: 12POPULATION KINNERTON,EVENJOB
page.content: THE POPULATION OF THE KINNERTON & EVENJOBB AREA IS 225.THIS HAS DECREASED BY HALF IN PAST 1OO YEARS BECAUSE OF THE DROP IN THE BIRTH RATE & LESS EMPLOYMENT IN AGRICULTURE.THE LARGEST FAMILY HAS 1O MEMBERS.AVERAGE FAMILY SIZE IS 4-5.THE OLDEST INHABIT- ANT IN THE AREA IS AGED 96 & LIVES IN KINNERTON.EVENJOBB HAS HAD AN INFLUX OF RETIRED PEOPLE IN RECENT YEARS. THERE ARE 26 CHILDREN OF SCHOOL AGE, 6 CHILDREN OF PRE-SCHOOL AGE.TYPICAL FAMILY SURNAMES ARE WATSON,EVANS, LLOYD,JONES,HAMER AND LAYTON.
